data.eml:eml: A review of the gobiid genus Akko (Teleostei: Gobiidae) with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Van, James L., Tassell, Baldwin, Carole C. (2004): A review of the gobiid genus Akko (Teleostei: Gobiidae) with description of a new species. Zootaxa 462: 1-15, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157403
